attributes.action: Shut on this years Boxing Day so families over the 5 days can see family
attributes.additional_details: Every year I spend most of my time in the kitchen while the family is in another room. I am not the only one thousands of people spend the majority of Christmas Day in the kitchen. Boxing Day is cold meats and salad a relaxed day you can all spend together. Retail ruins this and a lot of people have been separated from family this year so just this year give people a chance to enjoy being with family
attributes.background: We only have 5 days to see family but when you work in retail that’s just Christmas Day. Give retail a break on Boxing Day, the stock, sales and offers will still be there on the 27th. One day when you are not cooking a huge dinner when you can really be relaxed with your family is on Boxing Day.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all businesses on boxing day to allow people to enjoy family time in 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562501

Require all retailers to close on Boxing Day: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562108
